member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager
member.summary: Implements access to the database.

member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Common.RsdnDisposableMbrObject
member.summary: The base class for MBR disposable objects.

member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject
member.summary: Base class for MBR classes that need to be disposed.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject.Finalize
member.summary: Clean up all resources.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject.Dispose
member.summary: Clean up all resources and delete object from the finalization queue.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject.Close
member.summary: Synonym of the Dispose method.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject.Reopen
member.summary: Must be called if object reopen any resources to return the object in the finalization queue.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableMbrObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Can be overridden in child classes.
member.param: Equal 'true' if is called from Dispose method, otherwise from destructor

member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Common.IRsdnObject
member.summary: Common RSDN interface.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Begins a database transaction.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Begins a database transaction with the specified IsolationLevel value.
member.param: One of the IsolationLevel values.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.OpenConnection
member.summary: Opens a database connection with the default settings.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.OpenConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the configString parameter.
member.param: The configuration string.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.CreateConnectionObject
member.summary: Creates the connection object.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.CreateDataAdapterObject
member.summary: Creates the data adapter object.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.DeriveParameters(System.Data.IDbCommand)
member.summary: Populates the specified IDbCommand object's Parameters collection with parameter information for the stored procedure specified in the IDbCommand.
member.param: The IDbCommand referencing the stored procedure for which the parameter information is to be derived. The derived parameters will be populated into the Parameters of this command.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.CreateParameters(System.Object,System.Data.IDbDataParameter[])
member.summary: Creates an array of parameters from the business object.
member.param: A business object.
An array of paramters to be added to the result array.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.Parameter(System.String)
member.summary: Returns existing parameter.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.Parameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates an input parameter to IDbCommand object.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
The System.Object that is the value of the parameter.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.NullParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of an input parameter.
member.remarks: If the parameter is blank, it's converted to 'NULL' SQL value.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
The System.Object that is the value of the parameter.

member.summary: Creates an input parameter to IDbCommand object.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
The System.Object that is the value of the parameter.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.OutputParameter(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an output parameter to IDbCommand object.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.InputOutputParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates an input-output parameter to IDbCommand object.

The System.Object that is the value of the parameter.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.ReturnValue(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a return value to IDbCommand object.

member.summary: Helper function. Creates the command object and sets command type and command text.
member.param: The CommandType (stored procedure, text, etc.)
The SQL statement.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.AttachParameters(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Data.IDbDataParameter[])
member.summary: This method is used to attach array of IDbDataParameter to a IDbCommand.
member.param: The command to which the parameters will be added
An array of IDbDataParameters tho be added to command

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.DiscoverSpParameterSet(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resolve at run time the appropriate set of SqlParameters for a stored procedure.
member.param: The name of the stored procedure.
Whether or not to include their return value parameter.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.CloneParameters(System.Data.IDbDataParameter[])
member.summary: Copies cached parameter array.
member.param: The original parameter array.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.GetSpParameterSet(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of parameters appropriate for the stored procedure.
member.remarks: This method will query the database for this information, and then store it in a cache for future requests.
member.param: The name of the stored procedure.
A bool value indicating whether the return value parameter should be included in the results.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.AssignParameterValues(System.Data.IDbDataParameter[],System.Object[])
member.summary: This method assigns an array of values to an array of SqlParameters.
member.param: array of IDbDataParameters to be assigned values
array of objects holding the values to be assigned

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: The name of the stored prcedure
An array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: The number of rows affected by the command.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.ExecuteScalar(System.String)
member.summary: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the resultset returned by the query. Extra columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: The SQL statement or stored procedure name.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the resultset.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.Create
member.summary: Creates instance of the database manager.
member.returns: Instance of the database manager class.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.Open
member.summary: Creates instance of the database manager and opens connection.
member.returns: An instance of the database manager class.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Creates instance of the database manager and opens connection for given configuration.
member.remarks:
An actual connection database string is read from the appSettings section of application configuration file (App.config, Web.config or machine.config) according to the follow rule:
<appSettings> <add key="ConnectionString.configString" value="..." /> </appSettings>
member.param: Configuration string.
member.returns: An instance of the database manager class.

member.name: P:Rsdn.Framework.Data.DbManager.ExceptionText
member.summary: Text of the exception if it's going to occur.

remarks.para: The property is used in the method.
If there are no records in the resulting recordset, the business entity cannot be constructed. In this case the exception is thrown with the description.

member.summary: Base class for classes that need to be disposed.

member.summary: Clean up all resources.

member.summary: Clean up all resources and delete object from the finalization queue.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableObject.Close
member.summary: Synonym of the Dispose method.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableObject.Reopen
member.summary: Must be called if object reopen any resources to return the object in the finalization queue.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.DisposableObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Can be overridden in child classes.
member.param: Equal 'true' if is called from Dispose method, otherwise from destructor

member.summary: Scans all fields of the object and call DisposeObject method if it's needed. This method can be used outside of the class.

member.summary: Disposes a member in appropriate way.

member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager
member.summary: Provides access to configuration settings. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.#ctor
member.summary: Since this class provides only static methods, make the default constructor private to prevent instances from being created with "new ConfigManager()".

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetObject(System.String)
member.summary: Returns object from the configuration file for the given key. If string does not exist, it throws an exception.
member.param: Name of the key.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetObject(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns object from the configuration file for the given key. If key does not exist and defaultValue is not null, it return default value. Otherwise, it throws an exception.
member.param: Name of the key.
Default value.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns string from the configuration file for the given key. If string does not exist, it throws an exception.
member.param: Name of the key.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns string from the configuration file for the given key. If string does not exist, it return default value.
member.param: Name of the key.
Default value.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetInt(System.String)
member.summary: Returns value from the configuration file for the given key. If value does not exist, it throws an exception.
member.param: Name of the key.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetInt(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns value from the configuration file for the given key. If value does not exist, it return default value.
member.param: Name of the key.
Default value.

member.name: F:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.connectionStrings
member.summary: This table caches connection strings which were already read.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns connection string for given configuration. Connection string is read from 'appSettings' section of app.config file using 'ConnectionString.ConfigurationName' key, where 'ConfigurationName' is configString parameter of the method.
member.param: Configuration name.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.AddConnectionString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds new connection string or replaces existing one.
member.param: Configuration string.
Connection string.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManager.GetDefaultConfiguration
member.summary: Returns default configuration name. Current implementation just returns key of first record of the cache table.

member.name: T:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManagerException
member.summary: Configuration manager exception class.

member.name: M:Rsdn.Framework.Common.ConfigManagerException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ConfigManagerException class with the specified error message and InnerException property.
